alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 27 at 10:08AM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 14.0 feet Friday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 7 PM on Sunday, February 27th.
